captions.text: Jean shorts and a top?

Get with it. Jeans, boots
and t-shirt.

I like it, but isn't it like
"let's be friends"

instead of "take me dancing as
your girlfriend?"
I know, mini skirt and heels.

All I have that says "make me
your girlfriend,"

is too hot for today. Why does
it have to be so hot today!

Perhaps the world is trying to
tell you don't do it today.
Like destiny, or whatever.

Ana asked Pedro yesterday. Elisa
asked Federico last week.

Could it be that he is waiting
for me to ask him?
Sounds risky, huh.

Every time that I hint to him,
he only answers,

"maybe, maybe." 
Maybe, maybe.

I need to know before it gets
too late.

Let's see. Do it today.
My opinion, jean shorts
and a little white blouse.

Perfect. Jean shorts
and a blouse.
Play it safe.

Sweating would be the worst
thing ever. Let's play it safe.

Hey! Hey! Careful! What are
you thinking?

Your name is not on that
sign there is it?

Do you think you own
this road, huh?
Are you okay?
No, not really.
Excuse Me.

I can't go to class like
this. Maybe some other
day, but not today.
A boy?
Who are you?

María. It's my first day. My
father made us move here

last week. I told him to wait
until after the break,

but it he told me it wasn't my
decision.

I think it wasn't his decision,
you know?

But, well, he is a very proud
man so you can't say much.

I told him: "You're right, it's
not my decision."

I smiled at him, he smiled at me
again and well...
well here I am.

And today is my first day of
classes and I am super nervous
and my stomach hurts and I...

I don't want to because I don't
see the sense of it.

I'm sorry, I'm talking too
much, right?
Mom says I always do that.

If you want, you can use this.
Or maybe, if you find
an outlet you can use this.
Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

We are going to continue then
with the chapter of this...
Isabela, good evening.

Thanks for joining our class.
What is the function of DNA?
To make proteins.
But, how is it done?

Remember that chromosome pairs
are two double-helixes of DNA.

That is, chromosomes are
divided into telemere,

centromere and chromatid.
These two double-helixes
of DNA are pairs of...

I swear that is my new ringtone.
Excuse me. Excuse me.

They're calling it ringtone now?
Quiet, quiet. Let's continue.

I was telling you that the
duplicated chromosome has two
double helixes of DNA.

Hey, did you hear about the
asteroid that hit
the high school this morning?
Really?

Yes. In my biology class. It was
so big it caused an earthquake.

I heard a story this morning,
too.
Oh, yeah? What?

It was a story about four high
school boys that every weekend

hide together in a house to play
video games.

Because they are too scared to
ask a girl out.

I didn't have the chance to
thank you earlier.
Did you lose something?
Maybe... I don't know.

I wanted to know if someone had
already asked you to the dance.

And, what difference does it
make to you?

I was thinking that...
I don't know...

maybe you want to go with me.
Just... maybe.

Is that what you were thinking?
Maybe?

Very well, then...maybe I'll 
think about it and maybe
I'll let you know.

So, tell me. How was your
first day?
I am super nervous.
A Coca-Cola Film

Theme Music One
Direction "Clouds"

Starring Danna Sordo
and Karla Rodríguez

Director of Photography 
Carlos Verón
Editor Alex Rodríguez
